text: "El Amante" () is a song by American singer Nicky Jam from his seventh studio album, Fénix (2017). Written by Jam, Juan Vélez, and its producer Saga WhiteBlack, the track was released by Sony Music Latin on January 16, 2017, as the fourth single from the album. A remix with Ozuna and Bad Bunny was released on June 26, 2017. ==Music video== The music video for "El Amante" was released on January 15, 2017, and has received over 1.3 billion views on YouTube. ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" !Chart (2017) !Peak position |- ! scope="row"| Colombia (National-Report) | 3 |- ! scope="row"| Dominican Republic (Monitor Latino) | 6 |- ! scope="row"| Ecuador (National- Report) | 21 |- ! scope="row"| El Salvador (Monitor Latino) | 10 |- ! scope="row"| France (SNEP) | 135 |- ! scope="row"| Italy (FIMI) | 17 |- ! scope="row"| Mexico Airplay (Billboard) | 10 |- |- ! scope="row"| Panama (Monitor Latino) | 2 |- ! scope="row"| Paraguay (Monitor Latino) | 6 |- |- ! scope="row"| Spain (PROMUSICAE) | 3 |- |- ! scope="row"| Uruguay (Monitor Latino) | 12 |- |- |- |- |- !scope="row"| Venezuela (National-Report) | 13 |} === Year-end charts === {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders sortable" style="text-align:center" !Chart (2017) !Position |- ! scope="row"| Argentina (CAPIF) If necessary, click Digital Anual, then click 2017. | 5 |- ! scope="row"| Italy (FIMI) | 41 |- ! scope="row"| México (AMPROFON) | 7 |- ! scope="row"| Portugal (AFP) | 97 |- ! scope="row"| Switzerland (Schweizer Hitparade) | 75 |- !Chart (2019) !Position |- ! scope="row"| Portugal (AFP) | 2248 |} ==Certifications== ==References== Category:2017 singles Category:2017 songs Category:Nicky Jam songs Category:Songs written by Nicky Jam Category:Sony Music Latin singles Category:Spanish-language songs
